name: Ext_R4_ConceptMap_gr_source
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ConceptMap.group.source for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ConceptMap.group.source from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ConceptMap|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Source system where concepts to be mapped are defined
element.definition: An absolute URI that identifies the source system where the concepts to be mapped are defined.
element.comment: `ConceptMap.group.source` maps to R5 `ConceptMap.group.source`. Target added uri:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CodeSystem) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CodeSystem So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Source system where concepts to be mapped are defined
element.definition: An absolute URI that identifies the source system where the concepts to be mapped are defined.
element.comment: `ConceptMap.group.source` maps to R5 `ConceptMap.group.source`. Target added uri:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CodeSystem) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CodeSystem So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
